channel.title: SSP and New MiniGames ect
channel.description:
First stupid question: Is there any way to delete your server from the server status page other then waiting like 4 weeks to get it below 40%? Ive had mine up for over 2 months, (with over 90% uptime) and it would take me ages to get it below 40%.
2. I had my server running 3 weeks straight with restarts every 30 minutes. All of a sudden, after one restart, no one could connect. I had like 25 ppl on then boom! Then I was the only person who could connect. I checked portfowarding... is there something in my server files that couldve casud this problem?
3. Where can I find minigames to add to server. I tried making pest control from scratch but I failed...

item.title: SSP and New MiniGames ect
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Thx… il already know that… ppl are extremly angry on my forums… PLZ HELP!!

Also, I have this error when I run my webclient:

[code]Java Plug-in 1.6.0_11
Using JRE version 1.6.0_11 Java HotSpot™ Client VM
User home directory = C:\Documents and Settings\David Insley

c: clear console window
f: finalize objects on finalization queue
g: garbage collect
h: display this help message
l: dump classloader list
m: print memory usage
o: trigger logging
q: hide console
r: reload policy configuration
s: dump system and deployment properties
t: dump thread list
v: dump thread stack
x: clear classloader cache
0-5: set trace level to

load: class client.class not found.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed:http://davidscapewebclient.0catch.com/client/class.class
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
… 7 more
Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
[/code]

how i fix?
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2008, 11:37:05 am[/size][hr]I fixed the cant find client.class problem![br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 31, 2008, 12:06:23 pm[/size][hr]FIXED THE CONNECTION PROBLEM TO!

All i need now is deleting page from server status and new minigames!

Read full topic

@cmckiller wrote:

sorry for hearing that but…
all’s u do is learn how to code and you will go far and succeed

sorry
happy gaming!
